original_text: Then will I also walk contrary unto you, and will punish you yet seven times for your sins.
korean_text: 나 곧 나도 너희에게 대항하여 너희 죄로 말미암아 너희를 칠 배나 더 치리라

sentences.original_text: Then will I also walk contrary unto you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 또한 너희에게 반대하여 행하겠고

sentences.original_text: and will punish you yet seven times
